Name: Golden Mine Pickaxe
About the game: Golden Mine Pickaxe is a sandbox with RPG elements. You are a brave digger who went in search of minerals! Alone, you have to find as many of them as possible and improve your outfit in order to move further and further each time. Control the player with the arrows on the keyboard and use the mouse to break the blocks. Features: - Random level generation. - Pumping weapons. - Nice graphics. - Simple gameplay.
